PAD_BetrayedAstarion.synopsis: PAD that plays if you decide to tell the Gur Hunter in the Swamp where to find Astarion (HAG_GurHunter.lsj).  You tell the Hunter where your camp is, the Hunter says he'll take Astarion during the night the next time you go to sleep, then the dialog ends and this PAD plays.Your companion reacts to your decision to hand Astarion over (speaker 2) and then you clarify/justify your decision (speaker 1)
PAD_BetrayedAstarion.how_to_trigger: With a companion in your party and Astarion at your camp, speak to the Gur Hunter in the Swamp, reveal that you know Astarion, and tell the Hunter where your camp is.PAD plays once the dialog ends.

PAD_ProtectedAstarion.synopsis: This voicebark plays when a player chooses to not give up Astarion to the Gur hunter.Speaker 1 is assumed to be the player who did this action, and speaker 2 may have an opinionated comment on the outcome.Astarion can be neither of the speakers.
PAD_ProtectedAstarion.how_to_trigger: With a companion in your party and Astarion at your camp, speak to the Gur Hunter in the Swamp, lie and say that you have no idea who Astarion is.PAD plays once the dialog ends.

PAD_BetrayedAstarion_1.speaker: Player
PAD_BetrayedAstarion_1.text: You gave him up? I wasn't sure you would.

PAD_BetrayedAstarion_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BetrayedAstarion_0.text: He's too dangerous to have around. We'd always be sleeping with one eye open.

PAD_ProtectedAstarion_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ProtectedAstarion_1.text: You protected a child-stealing vampire? Bold choice.

PAD_ProtectedAstarion_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ProtectedAstarion_0.text: Let's hope it doesn't come back to bite me later.
